title: BRIEF-Staffing 360 Solutions Expects Q4 2017 Revenue To Be $59.5 Million
text: March 19, 2018 / 7:17 AM / Updated 39 minutes ago BRIEF-Staffing 360 Solutions Expects Q4 2017 Revenue To Be $59.5 Million Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Staffing 360 Solutions Inc: * STAFFING 360 SOLUTIONS ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY UNAUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR * SEES FY REVENUE $500 MILLION * ‍SEES PRELIMINARY Q4 2017 NET LOSS OF $9.1 MILLION, INCLUDED $7.9 MILLION OF CHARGES​ * ‍EXPECTS TO FILE ITS AUDITED RESULTS FOR FY 2017 ON FORM 10-K BEFORE SEC FILING DEADLINE OF MARCH 30, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
